AVAILABLE: IMMEDIATELY

This amazing newly gut renovated 1 bedroom is located in a walk-up building in Crown Heights. Near to Prospect Park, Prospect Park Zoo, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn Public Library, Kings Theatre and plenty of cafes, restaurants, pharmacies, and grocery stores.

Amenities include:
Great natural sunlight, beautiful hardwood floors, spacious layout, stainless steel appliances, microwave, dishwasher, laundry in-unit, air conditioning, recess lighting, and modern bathroom.

Building features:
Pet friendly and heat/hot water included.

TRANSPORTATION:
TRAINS- 2, 3, 4, 5
BUSES- B45, B48, B49

This unit won't last long!  Schedule your viewing today!
